name: Pot Pourri Blend #1
description:
A luscious and mysterious concoction of cured plants, flowers & spices for scenting your home. This revival of real pot pourri, moist and heady, has captured the bounty of the summer to provide year-round delight. Handmade by Darasina Perfume using ingredients grown in English gardens, and available in a limited supply of 250 pots.

300cc/650g per item.

For Christmas deliveries: place your order by 12pm on Fri 21st Dec. Items will be sent special delivery for signed arrival Sat 22nd Dec. Orders after this date will be despatched on 30th Dec. Thank you.

  • THE SCENT
  • INGREDIENTS
  • HOW TO USE

Blend #1 is inspired by the pot pourri recipes of the Bloomsbury Set, who were just as keen on the olfactory arts as they were on writing books and living dangerously. With over twenty ingredients preserved over months to intensify their innate fragrances, this blend is for those after a true olfactory adventure. It is homely, sophisticated, and utterly unusual.

Each pot contains over two litres of rose petals, macerated until heady. This heart is surrounded by invigorating aromatics including lemon verbena, mint, Russian coriander, bay, sweet marjoram and cured lemon peel. Resins of benzoin, storax and tonka bean bring warmth and comfort.

The pot pourri's midnight-black clay pot has been hand-made in an artisinal pottery near York.

Remove the cork stopper whenever you wish to release the scent. Kept safely, the fragrance will last for months.
